cobblemon.move.hydrosteam.desc: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.
cobblemon.move.psyblade.desc: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.
cobblemon.move.bloodmoon.desc: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.
cobblemon.move.matchagotcha.desc: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.syrupbomb.desc: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.
cobblemon.move.ivycudgel.desc: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.electroshot.desc: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Sp. Atk stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.
cobblemon.move.terastarstorm.desc: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.ficklebeam.desc: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. Sometimes all the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling the move's power.
cobblemon.move.burningbulwark.desc: The user's intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.
cobblemon.move.thunderclap.desc: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
cobblemon.move.mightycleave.desc: The user wields the light that has accumulated atop its head to cleave the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.
cobblemon.move.tachyoncutter.desc: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.hardpress.desc: The target is crushed with an arm, a claw, or the like to inflict damage. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.
cobblemon.move.dragoncheer.desc: The user raises its allies’ morale with a draconic cry so that their future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits. This rouses Dragon types more.
cobblemon.move.alluringvoice.desc: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.
cobblemon.move.temperflare.desc: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.
cobblemon.move.supercellslam.desc: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.
cobblemon.move.psychicnoise.desc: The user attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. For two turns, the target is prevented from recovering HP.
cobblemon.move.upperhand.desc: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.
cobblemon.move.malignantchain.desc: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.
cobblemon.battle.start.syrupbomb: %1$s got covered in sticky candy syrup!
cobblemon.battle.activate.ficklebeam: %1$s is going all out for this attack!
cobblemon.battle.fieldactivate.deltastre: The Mysterious stong winds weakened the attack!
cobblemon.battle.end.neutralizinggas: The effects of the neutralizing gas wore off!
cobblemon.battle.enditem.throatspray: The Throat Spray boosted %1$s's Sp. Attack!
cobblemon.battle.enditem.habanberry: The Haban Berry weakened the damage to %1$s!

cobblemon.battle.enditem.custapberry: %1$s can move faster than normal, thanks to its Custap Berry!
cobblemon.battle.enditem.absorbbulb: The Absorb Bulb boosted %1$s's Sp. Atk!

cobblemon.battle.weather.deltastream.sta: Mysterious strong winds are protecting Flying-type Pokémon!
cobblemon.battle.weather.deltastream.end: The mysterious strong winds have dissipated!
cobblemon.battle.weather.deltastream.upk: A mysterious strong wind blows across the battlefield!
cobblemon.battle.weather.primordialsea.s: A heavy rain began to fall!
cobblemon.species.onix-crystal.desc: An unique kind of Onix with a body made out of glass crystal. It is theorized to be an aged-up version of its kind that hasn't yet evolved.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-armored.desc: This Mewtwo is donned with a particular type of armor. Though it suppresses its psychic output somewhat, it allows it to shrug off hits from other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-shadow.desc: Possessed by the Shadow Synergy Stone, Mewtwo takes on this form. It aims to drain Gaia Power from other Synergy Stones in order to further improve its already apparent power.
cobblemon.species.castform-sunny.desc: This is the form Castform takes on bright days. In an experiment where Castform was placed in front of a heater, it didn't change to this form.
cobblemon.species.castform-rainy.desc: This is the form Castform takes when soaked with rain. When its body is compressed, water will seep out as if from a sponge.
cobblemon.species.castform-snowy.desc: This is Castform's form when caught in a hailstorm. Its whole body is chilled, and its skin is partially frozen!
cobblemon.species.deoxys-attack.desc: This Deoxys has transformed into its aggressive guise. It can fool enemies by altering its appearance.
cobblemon.species.deoxys-defense.desc: When it changes form, an aurora appears. It absorbs attacks by altering its cellular structure.
cobblemon.species.deoxys-speed.desc: A Pokémon that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.
cobblemon.species.burmy-sandy.desc: It creates a cloak by weaving together sand, mud, and silk it has spat out. This earthen cloak is ruined by wind and rain, so the Pokémon hides away in caves and other such places.
cobblemon.species.burmy-trash.desc: When confronted by a lack of other materials, Burmy will create its cloak using dust and refuse. The cloak seems to be more comfortable than one would think.
cobblemon.species.wormadam-sandy.desc: Its earthen skin is reasonably hard—it has no problem repelling a Starly's pecking, at least.
cobblemon.species.wormadam-trash.desc: Its body, composed of refuse, blends in to the scenery so much as to be inconspicuous. This seems to be the perfect way for the Pokémon to evade the detection of predators.
cobblemon.species.cherrim-sunshine.desc: After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It's full of energy while it's like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.
cobblemon.species.rotom-heat.desc: This Rotom has possessed a convection microwave oven. It will sear the surrounding area with its burning heat, then smile in delight.
cobblemon.species.rotom-wash.desc: This Rotom has possessed a washing machine that uses a special motor. It blasts out water to get enemies to back down.
cobblemon.species.rotom-frost.desc: When it's like this, Rotom likes to play pranks that are freezing cold. You may find it's turned the bath you just filled to solid ice!
cobblemon.species.rotom-fan.desc: In this form, Rotom applies its new power over wind to its love of pranks. It will happily blow away any important documents it can find.
cobblemon.species.rotom-mow.desc: This Rotom has possessed a lawn mower. It will mow down grass and flowers, then swagger around with pride at its accomplishments.
cobblemon.species.dialga-origin.desc: Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking resemblance to the creator Pokémon. Dialga now wields such colossal strength that one must conclude this is its true form.
cobblemon.species.palkia-origin.desc: It soars across the sky in a form that greatly resembles the creator of all things. This imitation of appearance is said to be Palkia's strategy for gaining Arceus's powers.
cobblemon.species.giratina-origin.desc: Giratina loses its legs upon changing into this form. It is believed this Pokémon must hail from a world where the heavens and the earth are as one, but there is no way of proving it.
cobblemon.species.shaymin-sky.desc: Upon taking in the scent of a particular rare flower, Shaymin is enveloped in light, and its tiny body transforms, conferring the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fighting.desc: Three beings whose power can hold both time and space fixed. The rift is born of disorder on the other side of this world.
cobblemon.species.arceus-flying.desc: The being poured the remains of its power into stone and buried it deep.
cobblemon.species.arceus-poison.desc: The rules of time and space change within the opposite world.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ground.desc: When the universe was created, its shards became this Plate.
cobblemon.species.arceus-rock.desc: It gathers power from the Plates, listening for the flute's song.
cobblemon.species.arceus-bug.desc: Where all creation was born, that is the being's place of origin.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ghost.desc: The other side of this world was given by the Original One to its raging third.
cobblemon.species.arceus-steel.desc: That which fills the other side of the world can shape the rage and mold it.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fire.desc: The power of defeated giants infuses this Plate.
cobblemon.species.arceus-water.desc: The rightful bearer of a Plate draws from the Plate it holds.
cobblemon.species.arceus-grass.desc: The powers of Plates are shared among Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.arceus-electric.desc: The third being raged, raining down bolts of anger.
cobblemon.species.arceus-psychic.desc: The Original One breathed alone before the universe came.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ice.desc: Two beings of time and space set free from the Original One.
cobblemon.species.arceus-dragon.desc: Three beings were born to bind time and space.
cobblemon.species.arceus-dark.desc: Two make matter, and three make spirit, shaping the world.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fairy.desc: The Original One is in all things. The Original One is nowhere at all. From all creations, over all creations, does the Original One watch over all.
cobblemon.species.tornadus-therian.desc: It is suspected this avian guise to be Tornadus's true form. Tornadus has been sighted crossing the ocean while in this form.
cobblemon.species.thundurus-therian.desc: Quick as a flash, it materializes out of nowhere. It pulverizes foes into nothingness with showers of devastatingly powerful lightning bolts launched from the string of orbs on its tail.
cobblemon.species.landorus-therian.desc: Landorus soars through the sky in this form, bestowing plentiful harvests upon the land and earning the people's reverence. It can traverse a whole region in a couple hours.
cobblemon.species.kyurem-white.desc: The sameness of Reshiram's and Kyurem's genes allowed Kyurem to absorb Reshiram. Kyurem can now use the power of both fire and ice.
cobblemon.species.kyurem-black.desc: The sameness of Zekrom's and Kyurem's genes allowed Kyurem to absorb Zekrom. Kyurem can now use the power of both electricity and ice.
cobblemon.species.keldeo-resolute.desc: The power that lay hidden in its body now covers its horn, turning it into a sword that can slice through anything.
cobblemon.species.genesect-water.desc: The Douse Drive allows it to use a Water-type Techno Blast, an attack which changes type depending on the Drive it holds.
cobblemon.species.genesect-electric.desc: The Shock Drive allows it to use an Electric-type Techno Blast, an attack which changes type depending on the Drive it holds.
cobblemon.species.genesect-fire.desc: The Burn Drive allows it to use a Fire-type Techno Blast, an attack which changes type depending on the Drive it holds.
cobblemon.species.genesect-ice.desc: The Chill Drive allows it to use an Ice-type Techno Blast, an attack which changes type depending on the Drive it holds.
cobblemon.species.meowstic-f.desc: Females are a bit more selfish and aggressive than males. If they don't get what they want, they will torment you with their psychic abilities.
cobblemon.species.venusaur-mega.desc: In order to support its flower, which has grown larger due to Mega Evolution, its back and legs have become stronger.
cobblemon.species.charizard-megax.desc: The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and creates intense blue flames.
cobblemon.species.charizard-megay.desc: Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.
cobblemon.species.blastoise-mega.desc: The cannon on its back is as powerful as a tank gun. Its tough legs and back enable it to withstand the recoil from firing the cannon.
cobblemon.species.beedrill-mega.desc: Its legs have become poison stingers. It stabs its prey repeatedly with the stingers on its limbs, dealing the final blow with the stinger on its rear.
cobblemon.species.pidgeot-mega.desc: With its muscular strength now greatly increased, it can fly continuously for two weeks without resting.
cobblemon.species.alakazam-mega.desc: Having traded away its muscles, Alakazam's true power has been unleashed. With its psychic powers, it can foresee all things.
cobblemon.species.slowbro-mega.desc: All the energy from Mega Evolution poured into the Shellder on its tail, leaving Slowpoke to be swallowed whole.
cobblemon.species.gengar-mega.desc: It tries to take the lives of anyone and everyone. It will even try to curse the Trainer who is its master!
cobblemon.species.kangaskhan-mega.desc: The explosive energy the child is bathed in causes temporary growth. The mother is beside herself with worry about it.
cobblemon.species.pinsir-mega.desc: The influence of Mega Evolution leaves it in a state of constant excitement. It pierces enemies with its two large horns before shredding them.
cobblemon.species.gyarados-mega.desc: Mega Evolution also affects its brain, leaving no other function except its destructive instinct to burn everything to cinders.
cobblemon.species.aerodactyl-mega.desc: When it Mega Evolves, it becomes more vicious than ever before. Some say that's because its excess of power is causing it pain.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-megax.desc: Psychic power has augmented its muscles. It has a grip strength of one ton and can sprint a hundred meters in two seconds flat!
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-megay.desc: Despite its diminished size, its mental power has grown phenomenally. With a mere thought, it can smash a skyscraper to smithereens.
cobblemon.species.ampharos-mega.desc: Massive amounts of energy intensely stimulated Ampharos's cells, apparently awakening its long-sleeping dragon's blood.
cobblemon.species.steelix-mega.desc: The cells within its body are stronger than any mineral and able to withstand any temperature. It moves incredibly slowly, but is also impervious to damage, and it lashes out at foes without flinching.
cobblemon.species.scizor-mega.desc: It stores the excess energy from Mega Evolution, so after a long time passes, its body starts to melt.
cobblemon.species.heracross-mega.desc: A tremendous influx of energy builds it up, but when Mega Evolution ends, Heracross is bothered by terrible soreness in its muscles.
cobblemon.species.houndoom-mega.desc: Its red claws and the tips of its tail are melting from high internal temperatures that are painful to Houndoom itself.
cobblemon.species.tyranitar-mega.desc: Due to the colossal power poured into it, this Pokémon's back split right open. Its destructive instincts are the only thing keeping it moving.
cobblemon.species.sceptile-mega.desc: It can cut off a portion of its tail to fire it like a missile at an opponent. Its lost tail will continue regenerating as long as it still has the energy required for Mega Evolution.
cobblemon.species.blaziken-mega.desc: When Blaziken Mega Evolves, it further hones the power of its kicks. As it unleashes a flurry of savage kicks, its legs can begin to burn from the friction of the surrounding atmosphere.
cobblemon.species.swampert-mega.desc: Mega Swampert fills the organs on its back with air before diving underwater or battling; it uses that pressure to increase the power of its devastating punches.
cobblemon.species.gardevoir-mega.desc: Mega Gardevoir's horns are said to be a physical manifestation of its heart, and it is able to use tremendous psychic power now that it is open.
cobblemon.species.sableye-mega.desc: Bathed in the energy of Mega Evolution, the gemstone on its chest expands, rips through its skin, and falls out.
cobblemon.species.mawile-mega.desc: It has an extremely vicious disposition. It grips prey in its two sets of jaws and tears them apart with raw power.
cobblemon.species.aggron-mega.desc: Using its horns, Mega Aggron is said to be able to destroy a steel tank.
cobblemon.species.medicham-mega.desc: Mega Medicham has formed four ghost-like arms around itself using its enhanced willpower, which can transform its spirit into a physical force.
cobblemon.species.manectric-mega.desc: Mega Evolution fills its body with a tremendous amount of electricity, but it's too much for Manectric to fully control.
cobblemon.species.sharpedo-mega.desc: The spines sprouting from its head are transformed fangs. If they're injured or broken off, the spines will regenerate countless times.
cobblemon.species.camerupt-mega.desc: It has a deep hatred of water or any moisture, with an explosive personality. The volcano on its back erupts constantly in an effort to intimidate its foes.
cobblemon.species.altaria-mega.desc: Mega Altaria's singing voice is even more beautiful than its regular form. It is known for its pleasant personality and is not timid.
cobblemon.species.banette-mega.desc: Extraordinary energy amplifies its cursing power to such an extent that it can't help but curse its own Trainer.
cobblemon.species.absol-mega.desc: It converts the energy from Mega Evolution into an intimidating aura. Fainthearted people expire from shock at the sight of it.
cobblemon.species.glalie-mega.desc: The excess energy from Mega Evolution spilled over from its mouth, breaking its jaw. It spews endless blizzards.
cobblemon.species.salamence-mega.desc: The stress of its two proud wings becoming misshapen and stuck together because of strong energy makes it go on a rampage.
cobblemon.species.metagross-mega.desc: Mega Evolution stimulated its brain. It emerged as a ruthless Pokémon that will clutch at any means of ensuring its victories.
cobblemon.species.latias-mega.desc: Mega Latias is said to be one of the fastest Pokémon in existence. It can reach a speed of Mach 4 while outpacing a jet in flight.
cobblemon.species.latios-mega.desc: Mega Latios is said to be one of the fastest Pokémon in existence. It can reach a speed of Mach 4 while outpacing a jet in flight.
cobblemon.species.lopunny-mega.desc: It swings its ears like whips and strikes its enemies with them. It has an intensely combative disposition.
cobblemon.species.garchomp-mega.desc: Excess energy melted its arms and wings, transforming them into giant scythes.
cobblemon.species.lucario-mega.desc: Bathed in explosive energy, its combative instincts have awakened. For its enemies, it has no mercy whatsoever.
cobblemon.species.abomasnow-mega.desc: The sprouts on its back grow into great shafts of ice when it Mega Evolves into Mega Abomasnow. It is strong enough to cover a whole mountain with snow.
cobblemon.species.gallade-mega.desc: When the situation demands it, Mega Gallade can use its psychic power to reshape both arms into blades simultaneously and fight using a dual-wielding style.
cobblemon.species.audino-mega.desc: Mega Audino can release pulses that reduce hostility, and the secondary feelers can put those who come in contact with them into a deep sleep.
cobblemon.species.diancie-mega.desc: In this form, it was known as the 'Royal Pink Princess' due to its colors and appearance. Due to it being blessed with both beauty and skill, Mega Diancie can easily adapt quickly to any situation.
cobblemon.species.kyogre-primal.desc: Through Primal Reversion and with nature's full power, it takes back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.
cobblemon.species.groudon-primal.desc: Primal Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
cobblemon.species.rayquaza-mega.desc: Mega Rayquaza was said to have been born from humanity's wish for salvation, channeled through the Key Stone of a Draconid Lorekeeper. It is the first recorded Pokémon to achieve Mega Evolution.
cobblemon.species.hoopa-unbound.desc: In its true form, it possess a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.
cobblemon.species.rattata-alola.desc: It shows no interest in anything that isn't fresh. If you take it shopping with you, it will help you pick out ingredients.
cobblemon.species.raticate-alola.desc: It has an incredibly greedy personality. Its nest is filled with so much food gathered by Rattata at its direction, it can't possibly eat it all.
cobblemon.species.sandshrew-alola.desc: It lives on snowy mountains. Its steel shell is very hard—so much so, it can’t roll its body up into a ball.
cobblemon.species.sandslash-alola.desc: This Pokémon's steel spikes are sheathed in ice. Stabs from these spikes cause deep wounds and severe frostbite as well.
cobblemon.species.diglett-alola.desc: Its head sports an altered form of whiskers made of metal. When in communication with its comrades, its whiskers wobble to and fro.
cobblemon.species.dugtrio-alola.desc: Its shining gold hair provides it with protection. It's reputed that keeping any of its fallen hairs will bring bad luck.
cobblemon.species.meowth-alola.desc: It's impulsive, selfish, and fickle. It's very popular with some Trainers who like giving it the attention it needs.
cobblemon.species.persian-alola.desc: It looks down on everyone other than itself. Its preferred tactics are sucker punches and blindside attacks.
cobblemon.species.geodude-alola.desc: Its body is a magnetic stone. Iron sand attaches firmly to the portions of its body that are particularly magnetic.
cobblemon.species.graveler-alola.desc: They eat rocks and often get into a scrap over them. The shock of Graveler smashing together causes a flash of light and a booming noise.
cobblemon.species.golem-alola.desc: It fires rocks charged with electricity. Even if the rock isn't fired that accurately, just grazing an opponent will cause numbness and fainting.
cobblemon.species.grimer-alola.desc: A Grimer, which had been brought in to solve a problem with garbage, developed over time into this form.
cobblemon.species.muk-alola.desc: While it's unexpectedly quiet and friendly, if it's not fed any trash for a while, it will smash its Trainer's furnishings and eat up the fragments.
cobblemon.species.exeggcute-alolabias.de: Although they are the same size as other Exeggcute, the ones produced in Alola are quite heavy. Their shells are packed full.
cobblemon.species.cubone-alolabias.desc: The skull it wears on its head is that of its dead mother. According to some, it will evolve when it comes to terms with the pain of her death.
cobblemon.species.marowak-alola.desc: The bones it possesses were once its mother's. Its mother's regrets have become like a vengeful spirit protecting this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.greninja-ash.desc: A form resembling Mega Evolution, its speed and power far outpace those of a normal Greninja. Its legs are strengthened, increasing its speed to a point where it becomes highly difficult to see and enabling it to dispatch enemies in a flash.
cobblemon.species.zygarde-10.desc: This is Zygarde when about 10% of its pieces have been assembled. It leaps at its opponent's chest and sinks its sharp fangs into them.
cobblemon.species.zygarde-complete.desc: Born when all of Zygarde's cells have been gathered together, it uses force to neutralize those who harm the ecosystem.
cobblemon.species.oricorio-pompom.desc: It lifts its opponents' spirits with its cheerful dance moves. When they let their guard down, it electrocutes them with a jolt.
cobblemon.species.oricorio-pau.desc: It relaxes its opponents with its elegant dancing. When they let their guard down, it showers them with psychic energy.
cobblemon.species.oricorio-sensu.desc: It charms its opponents with its refined dancing. When they let their guard down, it places a curse on them that will bring on their demise.
cobblemon.species.rockruff-dusk.desc: This is an unique kind of Rockruff. It appears capable of undergoing a special kind of evolution.
cobblemon.species.lycanroc-midnight.desc: This form of Lycanroc is reckless. It charges headlong at its opponents, attacking without any care about what injuries it might receive.
cobblemon.species.lycanroc-dusk.desc: This form of Lycanroc is normally calm and quiet. Once a battle begins, however, this Pokémon displays a ferocious fighting spirit.
cobblemon.pokedex.minior.desc: It feeds on dust in the atmosphere. The color of its core is said to be determined by the composition of the dust it eats.
cobblemon.species.silvally-typed.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.magearna-original.desc: This gorgeous Magearna looks as it did at the time of its invention. Its luxurious decoration pleased the king's daughter.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-duskmane.desc: This is its form while it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-dawnwings.des: This is its form while it's devouring the light of Lunala. It grasps foes in its giant claws and rips them apart with brute force.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-ultra.desc: Necrozma is at its full power in this form, radiating energy that has all sorts of effects on living beings and even nature itself. It is known as the 'blinding one' due to its brilliant appearance.
cobblemon.species.meowth-galar.desc: Living with a savage, seafaring people has toughened this Pokémon's body so much that parts of it have turned to iron.
cobblemon.species.ponyta-galar.desc: Its small horn hides a healing power. With a few rubs from this Pokémon's horn, any slight wound you have will be healed.
cobblemon.species.rapidash-galar.desc: Brave and prideful, this Pokémon dashes airily through the forest, its steps aided by the psychic power stored in the fur on its fetlocks.
cobblemon.species.slowpoke-galar.desc: Although this Pokémon is normally zoned out, its expression abruptly sharpens on occasion. The cause for this seems to lie in Slowpoke's diet.
cobblemon.species.slowbro-galar.desc: A Shellder bite set off a chemical reaction with the spices inside Slowbro's body, causing Slowbro to become a Poison-type Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.farfetchd-galar.desc: The stalks of leeks are thicker and longer in the Galar region. Farfetch'd that adapted to these stalks took on a unique form.
cobblemon.species.koffing-galar.desc: Long ago, during a time when droves of factories fouled the air with pollution, Koffing changed into this form for some reason.
cobblemon.species.weezing-galar.desc: This Pokémon consumes particles that contaminate the air. Instead of leaving droppings, it expels clean air.
cobblemon.species.mrmime-galar.desc: Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.
cobblemon.species.articuno-galar.desc: Its feather-like blades are composed of psychic energy and can shear through thick iron sheets as if they were paper.
cobblemon.species.zapdos-galar.desc: When its feathers rub together, they produce a crackling sound like the zapping of electricity. That's why this Pokémon is called Zapdos.
cobblemon.species.moltres-galar.desc: This Pokémon's sinister, flame-like aura will consume the spirit of any creature it hits. Victims become burned-out shadows of themselves.
cobblemon.species.slowking-galar.desc: It creates potions by mixing toxins with the food it’s eaten. Not even Slowking itself knows what effects the potions will have.
cobblemon.species.corsola-galar.desc: Sudden climate change wiped out this ancient kind of Corsola. This Pokémon absorbs others' life-force through its branches.
cobblemon.species.zigzagoon-galar.desc: Its restlessness has it constantly running around. If it sees another Pokémon, it will purposely run into them in order to start a fight.
cobblemon.species.linoone-galar.desc: It uses its long tongue to taunt opponents. Once the opposition is enraged, this Pokémon hurls itself at the opponent, tackling them forcefully.
cobblemon.species.mimejr-galarbias.desc: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.
cobblemon.species.darumaka-galar.desc: The colder they get, the more energetic they are. They freeze their breath to make snowballs, using them as ammo for playful snowball fights.
cobblemon.species.darmanitan-galar.desc: Though it has a gentle disposition, it's also very strong. It will quickly freeze the snowball on its head before going for a headbutt.
cobblemon.species.yamask-galar.desc: A clay slab with cursed engravings took possession of a Yamask. The slab is said to be absorbing the Yamask's dark power.
cobblemon.species.stunfisk-galar.desc: Its conspicuous lips lure prey in as it lies in wait in the mud. When prey gets close, Stunfisk clamps its jagged steel fins down on them.
cobblemon.species.toxtricity-lowkey.desc: It has an electrical organ on its chest. While generating electricity, it fills its surroundings with what sounds like the strumming of a bass guitar.
cobblemon.species.sinistea-antique.desc: This Sinistea lives in an antique teacup. As valuable as this Pokémon is, its awful taste remains unchanged.
cobblemon.species.polteageist-antique.de: Apparently a Polteageist’s disposition is affected by the type of tea the Pokémon came from. What teapot it inhabits makes no difference.
cobblemon.species.indeedee-f.desc: It dislikes conflict. If a fight occurs in its territory, it uses psychic power to throw things at the combatants in an effort to drive them away.
cobblemon.species.zacian-crowned.desc: Able to cut down anything with a single strike, it became known as the Fairy King's Sword, and it inspired awe in friend and foe alike.
cobblemon.species.zamazenta-crowned.desc: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master's Shield. It was feared and respected by all.
cobblemon.species.urshifu-rapidstrike.de: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in defeating foes by raining many blows down on them. Its strikes are nonstop, flowing like a river.
cobblemon.species.calyrex-ice.desc: According to lore, this Pokémon showed no mercy to those who got in its way, yet it would heal its opponents' wounds after battle.
cobblemon.species.calyrex-shadow.desc: Legend says that by using its power to see all events from past to future, this Pokémon saved the creatures of a forest from a meteorite strike.
cobblemon.species.growlithe-hisui.desc: They patrol their territory in pairs. It is believed the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.
cobblemon.species.arcanine-hisui.desc: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.
cobblemon.species.voltorb-hisui.desc: An enigmatic Pokémon that happens to bear a resemblance to a Poké Ball. When excited, it discharges the electric current it has stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.
cobblemon.species.electrode-hisui.desc: The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, this Pokémon lets loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.
cobblemon.species.cyndaquil-hisuibias.de: Hails from the Johto region. Though usually curled into a ball due to its timid disposition, it harbors tremendous firepower.
cobblemon.species.quilava-hisuibias.desc: This creature's fur is most mysterious—it is wholly impervious to the burning touch of flame. Should Quilava turn its back to you, take heed! This indicates a forthcoming attack.
cobblemon.species.typhlosion-hisui.desc: Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them to the afterlife. It is believed its form has been influenced by the energy of the sacred mountain towering at Hisui's center.
cobblemon.species.oshawott-hisuibias.des: This Pokémon from the Unova region uses the shell on its belly as a weapon to cut down its foes.
cobblemon.species.dewott-hisuibias.desc: Its exquisite double-scalchop technique is likely the result of daily training, and it can send even masters of the blade fleeing in defeat.
cobblemon.species.samurott-hisui.desc: Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is a product of the Pokémon's evolution in the region of Hisui. Its turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.
cobblemon.species.petilil-hisuibias.desc: The leaves on its head are highly valued for medicinal purposes. Dry the leaves in the sun, boil them, and then drink the bitter decoction for remarkably effective relief from fatigue.
cobblemon.species.lilligant-hisui.desc: It is suspected that its well-developed legs are the result of a life spent on mountains covered in deep snow. The scent it exudes from its flower crown heartens those in proximity.
cobblemon.species.zorua-hisui.desc: A once-departed soul, returned to life in Hisui. Derives power from resentment, which rises as energy atop its head and takes on the forms of foes. In this way, Zorua vents lingering malice.
cobblemon.species.zoroark-hisui.desc: With its disheveled white fur, it looks like an embodiment of death. Heedless of its own safety, Zoroark attacks its nemeses with a bitter energy so intense, it lacerates Zoroark's own body.
cobblemon.species.braviary-hisui.desc: Screaming a bloodcurdling battle cry, this huge and ferocious bird Pokémon goes out on the hunt. It blasts lakes with shock waves, then scoops up any prey that float to the water's surface.
cobblemon.species.goomy-hisuibias.desc: Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it's nice and humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pokémon instantly becomes lethargic.
cobblemon.species.bergmite-hisuibias.des: Lives on mountains blanketed in perennial snow. It freezes water vapor in the air to make the ice helmet that it dons for defense.
cobblemon.species.avalugg-hisui.desc: The armor of ice covering its lower jaw puts steel to shame and can shatter rocks with ease. This Pokémon barrels along steep mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow.
cobblemon.species.rowlet-hisuibias.desc: Flies noiselessly on delicate wings. It has mastered the art of deftly launching dagger-sharp feathers from those same wings.
cobblemon.species.dartrix-hisuibias.desc: Regularly basks in sunlight to gather power—presumably due to the frigid climate. Nonetheless, the edges of the blade quills set into its wings are keen as ever.
cobblemon.species.decidueye-hisui.desc: The air stored inside the rachises of Decidueye's feathers insulates the Pokémon against Hisui's extreme cold. It is firm proof that evolution can be influenced by environment.
cobblemon.species.basculegion-f.desc: It can afflict a target with terrifying illusions that are under its control. The deeper the sadness in its friends' souls, the paler Basculegion becomes.
cobblemon.species.enamorus-therian.desc: A different guise from its feminine humanoid form. From the clouds, it descends upon those who treat any form of life with disrespect and metes out wrathful, ruthless punishment.
cobblemon.species.tauros-paldeacombat.de: This kind of Tauros, known as the Combat Breed, is distinguished by its thick, powerful muscles and its fierce disposition.
cobblemon.species.tauros-paldeablaze.des: People call this kind of Tauros the Blaze Breed due to the hot air it snorts from its nostrils. Its three tails are intertwined.
cobblemon.species.tauros-paldeaaqua.desc: It swims by jetting water from its horns. The most notable characteristic of the Aqua Breed is its high body fat, which allows it to float easily.
cobblemon.species.oinklogne-f.desc: This Pokémon sends a flowerlike scent wafting about. Well-developed muscles in its legs allow it to leap more than 16 feet with no trouble at all.
cobblemon.species.ursaluna-bloodmoon.des: This special Ursaluna crossed the sea and drifted ashore in a new land. It can see in the dark with its left eye and protects itself with mud that is as hard as iron.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-wellspring.des: This form excels in both attack and defense. It ceaselessly unleashes moves like a spring gushes water.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-hearthflame.de: This form is the most aggressive, bombarding enemies with the intensity of flames blazing within a hearth.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-cornerstone.de: This form has excellent defenses, absorbing impacts solidly like the cornerstones that support houses.
cobblemon.species.terapagos-terastal.des: The shell is made of crystallized Terastal energy. When struck by a move, this shell absorbs the move’s energy and transfers it to Terapagos.
